feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Single domain setup when only one org in the system by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18383
  • fix: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'timeZone') by @Praashh in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18107
  • fix: cancel workflows on cancel booking by @VK-RED in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17871
  • feat: insights - render layout only once by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18489
  • fix: v2 slots timeZone parameter by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18488
  • fix: failing org spec test by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18483
  • feat: Prevent re-renders (moving SessionProvider to Root level for both app router / pages router) by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18493
  • perf: Remove zod from edge runtime by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18494
  • chore: remove unused layout code from SideBar by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18487
  • fix: Increase Tasker queue limit to 1000 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18482
  • fix: Make it easier to manage group options and also improve attribute options performance with 100s of options by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18486
  • feat: bookings - render layout only once by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18490
  • chore: remove unused layouts: MainLayout & MainLayoutAppDir by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18498
  • fix: 404 on the public form page for a sub-team form when the owner itself was removed from the org by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18495
  • chore: Remove all instances of useIntercom by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18500
  • fix: checkly tests by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18501
  • revert: "fix: improve useInViewObserver hook to trigger when observer is in view on mount" by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18504
  • fix: type + build errors by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18502

New Contributors

  • @Praashh made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18107

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.13...v4.8.14

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18496
  • chore: Add Salesforce tests to getContacts method by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18225
  • chore: app router - /event-types pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18181
  • perf: use react svg cache from root level by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18506
  • feat: add DataTableWrapper by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18503
  • fix: add index to AssignmentReason by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18520
  • chore: Revert "chore: app router - /team, /org, /[user] booking pages (excl. embeds) (#18186) by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18526
  • feat: Insihts analytics app added by @7hakurg in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18461
  • feat: Add auto payment methods for paid bookings on Stripe by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18513
  • fix: Description not rendered as html in select event types screen when installing an app by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18354
  • feat: support phone based booking api by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17635
  • feat: api v2 org ooo crud by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18499

New Contributors

  • @7hakurg made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18461

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.14...v4.8.15

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: moved docs into mintlify by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18536
  • chore: change identifier by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18518
  • fix: payment not working in booker by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18540
  • fix: Bailey's minor docs by @mintlify in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18543
  • chore: fixed help logo by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18551
  • chore: mintlify updates by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18552
  • feat: Mintlify /help edits by @mintlify in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18555
  • fix: added videos and fixed iframe sizes for help page docs by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18558
  • chore: temporarily skip a failing E2E test by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18560
  • chore: child key missing by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18542
  • fix: Handle booker UI busy or skip on timeslot by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18553
  • fix: Update org readme by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18524
  • perf: Improve routing insights view by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18557
  • chore: clean up some code in app router routes by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18541
  • mintlify help changes by @mintlify in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18565
  • mintlify help edits by @mintlify in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18562
  • chore: Salesforce - optimize getContact method [CAL-4940] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18289
  • feat: bulk shorten links with dub.links.createMany by @steven-tey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18539
  • chore: Upgrade jsforce to 3.6.2 and use jsforce-node by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18363
  • chore: Webhook should timeout fast on e2e by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18570
  • fix: flaky e2e of manage-booking-questions test by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18574
  • chore: cleanup â€” remove HeadSeo from migrated app router components by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18576
  • chore: fix SVG warning on render by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18572
  • fix: date filter for the same day showing appointments of the day before by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18579
  • fix: billing plain chat working by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18530
  • fix: Unpublished org is visible as an option in the team list during workflow creation by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18522
  • fix: improve filters at /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18581
  • fix: flaky e2e test in saml.e2e by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18559
  • docs: fix footer socials in /help and other broken pages by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18578
  • fix: broken platform members table by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18583
  • feat: added pagination to platform managed users table by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18523
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18584
  • chore: improve ooo reason documentation apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18582

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.15...v4.8.16

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: granola.ai app by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18585
  • fix: wrong Meeting Ended payload in zapier by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18202
  • fix: Create dub links if valid url by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18588
  • docs: fix error introduced in #18578 by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18593
  • feat: Round Robin weights future members toggle by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17782
  • fix: detailed customer card by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18511
  • chore: app router - all sub-pages in /apps by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16976
  • chore: app router 404 page by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18597
  • feat: render custom error page for unexpected sever error + removepages/_error by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18606
  • fix: app router not-found page cannot be static by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18610
  • fix: unkey async false by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18611
  • chore: redirect to /500 if pathname does not exist + better error handling by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18615
  • chore: gracefully handle 404s from pages router's dynamic pages + tests by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18618
  • chore: use custom 404 in pages/_error by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18622
  • fix: parsing teamId by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18623
  • chore: restore error pages for pages router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18625
  • fix: disabling guest workflow emails by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18628
  • revert: "feat: bulk shorten links with dub.links.createMany (#18539)" by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18587

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.16...v4.8.18

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: disable sending sms when email is present by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18632
  • fix: main lint errors by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18634
  • feat: don't show zapier/make webhooks in webhook list by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18607
  • fix: make ESLint work and fix lint errors that were undetected before by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18639
  • chore: clean up config matcher in middleware by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18638
  • fix: potential fix for flaky layout shift by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18651
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18598
  • fix: /booking page datefilter by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18654
  • chore: log error to Sentry in app router error page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18637
  • perf: improve routing insights view (2) by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18566
  • feat: get org ooo entries and filters/sort by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18645
  • fix: phone number in confirmation email by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18642
  • chore: platform libraries readme publish reasons by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18646
  • fix: BUG: adding filters to settings/teams/[team-id]/members page thrâ€¦ by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18631
  • perf: no need for two query fetches for d link (private booking page) by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18659
  • fix: html render from calendar invite by @Praashh in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18577
  • feat: Routing form submitted but no booking - Salesforce actions by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18616
  • chore: migrate /team booking pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18656
  • fix: Booker atom name booking field by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18653
  • chore: migrate /org team pages, team type pages and user type pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18668
  • refactor: use DataTable for /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18589
  • fix: Remove export keyword @ route - only default allowed by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18682
  • fix: disable custom templates for free plan by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18635

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.18...v4.8.19
